item.title: Kinetic Trust Ltd Hits New 52-Week High of Rs.39.46 on 29 Dec 2025
item.description: Kinetic Trust Ltd, a key player in the Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC) sector, surged to a fresh 52-week and all-time high of Rs.39.46 on 29 Dec 2025, marking a significant milestone in its market performance. This rally underscores the stock’s robust momentum amid a broadly subdued market environment. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Borosil Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Borosil Ltd’s share price has declined to a fresh 52-week low, touching an intraday low of ₹278 on 29 Dec 2025, marking a significant milestone in its recent trading performance. The stock is now just 0.14% above its lowest price in the past year, reflecting sustained downward pressure over the last several sessions. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Trigyn Technologies Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend

item.title: Surana Solar Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend

Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: JHS Svendgaard Laboratories Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Underperformance

This new low reflects ongoing challenges faced by the company within the FMCG sector, as it continues to underperform against key benchmarks and sector averages. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Broad Market Weakness; Small Caps Drag Performance
item.description: Indian equity benchmarks Sensex and Nifty closed lower on 29 Dec 2025, weighed down by broad-based declines across sectors and a pronounced weakness in small-cap stocks. The Sensex ended at 84,695.54, down 345.91 points or 0.41%, while the Nifty 50 slipped 100.2 points, or 0.38%, to close at 25,942.10. Market breadth was decidedly negative, with a significant majority of stocks declining, reflecting cautious investor sentiment amid mixed global cues and subdued domestic triggers. Time: 2 hours ago
